sentences.en: It's not the chirping , rambunctious play that they did when they first arrived.
sentences.cn: 他们 现在 已经不像刚开始见面那会儿, 总是冲着对方乱叫,或者在玩耍时动作粗暴.

sentences.en: Their rambunctious son always got into trouble.
sentences.cn: 他们那个不受管束的儿子老是惹麻烦.

words.tran_cn: 难控制的；喧闹的；粗暴的；骚乱的

trans.tran_en: noisy, full of energy, and behaving in a way that cannot be controlled
